title: Zhonyas hourglass NEEDS to be removed
body: This item is without a doubt the most broken item in the entire game. and has been for way to fucking long. Also this isnt me trying to spark a discussion or a debate whether or not it actually needs to be removed because there is no need when the answer is clearly yes. yes it does need to be removed. There is no fucking counter play to it. its stats are to good for it to have such a broken active. Riot needs to just remove zhonyas hourglass and make a QSS item for AP users cus that is something that they need. the day riot decides to kill two birds with one stone and do exactly that is the day they make the best decision they ever have.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ho1d This Q,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-19T17:04:03.432+0000)
>
> This item is without a doubt the most broken item in the entire game. and has been for way to fucking long. Also this isnt me trying to spark a discussion or a debate whether or not it actually needs to be removed because there is no need when the answer is clearly yes. yes it does need to be removed. 

Well there goes my hope of having a meaningful discussion.

no counterplay to an item that stuns its user.

hmm. youre right. i cant see anything you could possibly do about that.

An item that stuns its user, doesn't heal them either, and is usually used when you're about to die, meaning that unless they have their entire team next to them to help, it doesn't help in any way other than delaying a fight for 2.5 seconds. Yet still AD champs get a second life, access to lifesteal, and a lot of items with resistances and survivability in general...

if you honestly think that zhonyas is just a "die 2,5sec later"  button.... just watch 10 games of pro/challenger games and count how many zhons end with deaths of the user without negative repercussions for the other team (such as a counter kill/objective sneak or whatever)

Zhonyas is easily the most powerful active in the game by a mile. Ask any player who is in D1 maste/chall or any pro.

Ah, the classic argument of "bUt D1 aNd aBoVe pLaYeRs sAy ThIs oR tHaT". You do realize they are the top 0.5% of the ENTIRE playerbase right? They know the strength and weaknesses of everything, of course the best players will be able to use an item to its fullest and make up for the item's weaknesses with good decision making and knowledge, that's a given. But besides the item's active and stats you ignore the fact that the reason they are so succesful is because they play around it perfectly, they know when they can be aggressive or passive, they keep track of the map and CDs. the remaining 99% of the playerbase isn't at that level and probably never will be.

That doesn't mean the item isn't needed, or else we'd have assassins destroying every mage with no counterplay.

Thanks for the downvote :)

I am not saying it shouldn't exist. I am saying it is hands down the most powerful active in the game barring none. No more no less.

But the fact that pros use it better than everyone else is also irrelevant because that applies to all items. 
Yet, zhonyas is used effectively TONS more in iron-plat than say QSS.

> Yet, zhonyas is used effectively TONS more in iron-plat than say QSS.

You think it might have something to do with Zhonyas being a full item and QSS being just a component? Also the fact that you can have QSS (1300g, 90 sec CD, turns into a lifesteal item when upgraded) AND GA at the same time while also having any of the Lifeline items for maximum survivability. AP champions get what, Zhonyas (2900g, 120 sec CD, being a self stun/silence that rewards good positioning and punishes bad positioning), Banshees (uncontrollable spellshield that gets proc'd by anything) sometimes... That's basically it.

1. QSS has a completed item too. And I would love to see what % of QSS are successful in bronze-plat compared to zhonyas 

2. Why are you comparing AP and AD items? Where did that come from? (btw you missed Seraphs as a defensive AP item)

3. Only subjective claim I have made is "zhonya's is the most powerful active".

> [{quoted}](name=Sebastit7d,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2019-03-19T19:33:38.005+0000)
>
> Ah, the classic argument of "bUt D1 aNd aBoVe pLaYeRs sAy ThIs oR tHaT". You do realize they are the top 0.5% of the ENTIRE playerbase right? They know the strength and weaknesses of everything, of course the best players will be able to use an item to its fullest and make up for the item's weaknesses with good decision making and knowledge, that's a given. But besides the item's active and stats you ignore the fact that the reason they are so succesful is because they play around it perfectly, they know when they can be aggressive or passive, they keep track of the map and CDs. the remaining 99% of the playerbase isn't at that level and probably never will be.
> 
> That doesn't mean the item isn't needed, or else we'd have assassins destroying every mage with no counterplay.

Exhaust says otherwise
while i agree that ad champs get a second life with GA is dumb as fuck and wouldnt mind seeing that go as well. A lot of the time that 2.5 seconds is just enough time to get them out

{{item:3026}} {{item:2419}} 

Get rid of zhonyas and both of these need to be killed too.
Found the assassin main.
actually im more of a mage main

> [{quoted}](name=Ho1d This Q,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-03-19T19:09:44.810+0000)
>
> actually im more of a mage main

I'm honestly sure you're complaining about Zhonyas because **you play Zed** against an Anivia with Zhonyas and got annoyed with it & went 5/11/4.

U would be wrong. I've been complaining about zhonayas for far longer than that so no that game is not the reason why im complaining now. Although im glad u took the time to actually look at my match history XD.  Did u notice there was 3 hourglasses and a GA that game? Yeah that was just a fun game to deal with
You're a Zed player. Why do think you have rights to talk about "fun"?
Zed's not even in my top 10 champions dude. i've only just recently started playing him lik 3 days ago lol
It aint broken but it isnt fun to play against
I think he got confused with stopwatch...

oh don't get me wrong they both need to go. The stasis active in general needs to be removed from items. 

Now that i think about it making it a summoner spell with like a 3-4 minute cooldown actually might not be a bad idea.

NO.

Not only is it AP's one and only defensive item against AD but also the stats have been nerfed so much, the item is basically a joke anyway. We need it in the game. If it was removed, mages would be obliterated from the game. 

Someone is just salty that the enemy used it against them.

My problem isnt with fucking zhonya's stats or anything. but i main zed and its getting fucking annoying because everyone gets it (even some adcs) and im basically useless because zed's deathmark is completely clusterfucked by it
{{champion:238}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ho1d This Q,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-19T17:04:03.432+0000)
>
> this isnt me trying to spark a discussion or a debate whether or not it actually needs to be removed because there is no need when the answer is clearly yes.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/rant
If you get rid of GA and universally nerf lifesteal, sure
fuck yeah that's what im talking about. id be so down for that

Absolutely not.
Removing Zhonya's from the game is a terrible Idea. That item is literally the only defensive item AP Users gave against AD Champions. This would give champions like Zed or Fizz the ability to all-in you & you would most likely die to their burst.


>make a QSS item for AP users

Coincidentally, you used to be able to cleanse Zed & Fizz ultimates, but those interactions were removed. Even if they were re-added, It's still not justifiable & Assassin's have more than one way to skin you in lane other than pressing [R].

> [{quoted}](name=Kingslayër,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-03-19T19:13:51.034+0000)
>
> Absolutely not.
> Removing Zhonya's from the game is a terrible Idea. That item is literally the only defensive item AP Users gave against **AD Champions**. This would give champions like Zed or **Fizz** the ability to all-in you & you would most likely die to their burst.
> 

It's not against AD champions, but against anyone.

While mages get to build an item that they fully benefit from, AD squishies go out of their way building Maw, GA is very stat inefficient compared to Zhonyas, though I guess Phantom Dancer lifeline is fine for an ADC.

Its literally the cure for ap mages who are going against this power creep....
Imagine getting hit by a zed ult and not being able to stop it. Imagine a brand ult bursting you down and just taking it as lux or neeko....
thats why they should make qss able to cleanse ults like zed and fizz like it used to
You mean when those champs were dead and unpickable above diamond 2 elo? Those times that assassins were picked once every 1000 pro games?

Oh who knew...
Defensive items and counter-play are now unhealthy for the game.

Don't make me laugh.
The item's own cooldown is enough for most champions to use their ulti about 3 times, and you want it removed?

uhhhhh yeah i do want it removed that was kind of the point of this post. also i never said defensive items and counter-play was unhealthy for the game just the stasis active. if you want an AP armor item thats fine. but the active has to go. fuck you could buff its stats a little bit i dont care as long as the active is removed

> [{quoted}](name=Ho1d This Q,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-03-20T03:42:12.263+0000)
>
> uhhhhh yeah i do want it removed that was kind of the point of this post. also i never said defensive items and counter-play was unhealthy for the game just the stasis active. if you want an AP armor item thats fine. but the active has to go. fuck you could buff its stats a little bit i dont care as long as the active is removed

Oh great idea.
Shall we also remove qss, stoneplate, guardian Angel, Banshee's veil, edge on knight, etc and other defensive items to appeal your delicate gameplay?

Do us a favour and don't ever suggest anything.
Like I said before, Zhonya's cooldown is enough for a champion to ulti like 3 times. And that item isn't even that useful except for its active and the only useful tool for mage items.
Did i ever say remove qss, stoneplate, banshee's veil, and edge of night? No i did not. Dont try to put in my mouth kid. You just make yourself look dumb.

> [{quoted}](name=Ho1d This Q,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=0008000000000001,timestamp=2019-03-20T14:39:09.680+0000)
>
> Did i ever say remove qss, stoneplate, banshee's veil, and edge of night? No i did not. Dont try to put in my mouth kid. You just make yourself look dumb.

I never said you said all this nor trying to shove in words in your mouth. There's already shit shoved in your mouth to begin with anyway.
I'm asking if shall we also. There's a difference.

But since you couldn't tell that difference, it's safe to say you're the dumb one here.

You don't even have a good argument on why Zhonya should be removed and you expect to be taken seriously?
Don't make me laugh.

its essentially a get out of jail free card. you try to all in someone and use your full combo but then they just press one button and completely negates your full combo. now they have 2.5 seconds (which is a decent amount of time to have in a fight)  to assess the situation and come up with a way to get out via flash or depending on the champion use an escape that was on cooldown when you went in but now is available to them because they got 2.5 free seconds (vladamir's w for example or fizz's e) So in a situation where the one who went all in and played it right and the other champion should of died now becomes that champion lives and gets out of safely. Or their team shows up out of nowhere cus your just standing there waiting for the stasis to be over so you can get the kill that you deserve and picks you off for it. 

there is also the ridiculousness of champions whose ults actually synergize with this item. champions like swain, morgana, kennen, anivia, heimerdingers turrets, etc. why are they able to jump in the middle of the enemy team pop their ults then press zhonyas and cant be punished by the enemy but their ults still fucking them up for free?

there's some very good arguments why this item shouldn't be in this game anymore and if you can't see that then im sorry there's just no hope for you bud.

> [{quoted}](name=Ho1d This Q,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QUUrEhiq,comment-id=000800000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-03-20T18:12:17.594+0000)
>
> its essentially a get out of jail free card. you try to all in someone and use your full combo but then they just press one button and completely negates your full combo. now they have 2.5 seconds (which is a decent amount of time to have in a fight)  to assess the situation and come up with a way to get out via flash or depending on the champion use an escape that was on cooldown when you went in but now is available to them because they got 2.5 free seconds (vladamir's w for example or fizz's e) So in a situation where the one who went all in and played it right and the other champion should of died now becomes that champion lives and gets out of safely. Or their team shows up out of nowhere cus your just standing there waiting for the stasis to be over so you can get the kill that you deserve and picks you off for it.

> 
> there's some very good arguments why this item shouldn't be in this game anymore and if you can't see that then im sorry there's just no hope for you bud.

Oh the classic get out of jail card free bullshit where she same can be said for QSS and Guardian Angel.

Zhonya may be an item with a powerful effect but it's a defensive item. All it does is make you survive longer but not automatically make you a bigger threat. Rush a Zhonya instead of a Ludens and you'll be useless af in the match with no damage whatsoever.

Well then i'm sorry i don't share your biased 12 year old view into thinking a defensive item is somewhat toxic to the game and yada yada, but i'm just gonna conclude you're just a delusional moron who keeps on getting outplayed by Zhonyas.
And before you say "it's a press of a button" well guess what smartass, EVERYTHING IN THIS GAME IS IN A PRESS OF A BUTTON.

If you don't like that, do yourself a favor and delete this game. Since you hate getting countered so much.

Rather than nagging about it, why don't you just start using it and learn more about it. Or are you too much of an assassin main?

I'm guessing a Zed main.

like i've already said im not even an assassin main. I main mages. My top 3 mid laners are xerath, velkoz, and anivia.

but hey look on the bright side at least you know there is no hope for you. 
Don't make me laugh. lol

Zhonya is also a build recommendation for Vel'Koz since he's a true damage kraken, he can spare an item slot (or 2) for a defensive item.

A mage main wanting a mage item deleted.
What a strange world.

i mean that kind of goes to show how broken the item is. I rarely ever buy it because i rarely feel the need to buy it. Im smart enough to not get myself into those situations where i would need it. i'll admit that there are some games where im forced to buy it. I dont like it and it makes me feel like scum. thankfully that only happens like 1 in every 10-20 games or so.
